name: Bunny Dud's Fabulous Adventure
description:
You know the game Catto Boi by the awesome developer Mango-ki?

But played all the part of the game?

And searching for something like the awesome brave cat?

Then you are in the right place join Bunny Dud's Journey!

The game will have:

- Tutorial room

- Melee attacks

- Long story

- Creepy stuff!

PS. The thumbnail of the main menu isn't the final version.
